desc: Online home of Artisan Gifts & Flowers of Coquitlam, BC! Locally hand made products, pottery, woodwork, jewelry, body care, soaps, greeting cards & more. Contactless shopping with scheduled contactless pickups at the retail location.

layout.text: A collection of our favourite items from our brick and mortar store - check back often as we add new items!!!!
CONTACT US TO ORDER FOR PICKUP OR DELIVERY
